Document.author: heikki@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Better error message to help users who created tables with < 3.23.54 where MySQL implicitly added a PRIMARY KEY definition

Document.author: serg@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 removed chroot() bugfix, now --chroot in 3.23 is broken again :((

Document.author: heikki@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Remove an assertion which can fail in a race of 3 threads

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Optimization of CASE bug fix

Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - applied patch provided by Debian to enhance security (This way all logs 
 and databases are created world-nothing).

Document.author: Sinisa@nasamreza.org
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Fix for a bug in query logging ...

Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Updated comment

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi

history annotate diffs 
 
 Safety fix to not allow one to specify too big max_alloc_packet

Document.document:

 reverting a patch

Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 merge fixes

Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - clean up the vio_* and ctype-* symlinks that are created by link_source 
 (thanks to Christian Hammers from Debian for the patch)

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Fixed max_key_length when using UNIQUE keys.

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Added O_BINARY flag to all my_fopen() calls. 
 (To make the current tests results work on windows)

Document.author: Sinisa@nasamreza.org
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Delete: libmysql/net.c

Document.author: heikki@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Backport bugfix from 4.0: index cursor restoration could theoretically fail

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Fixed wrong packed length for packet > 16M. 
 (Not used in 3.23)

Document.author: heikki@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Backport from 4.0: fix possible adaprive hash index latch hang

Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Backport from 4.0: fix the BLOB hang if the index tree is of height 1
